content: Since going public, we have generated distributable earnings in excess of our dividend in each quarter and paid out $3.54 in dividends per share, including paying out $2.23 per share during the 2022 fiscal year. Beginning with our quarterly results, for the fourth quarter ended December 31, 2022, we had GAAP net income of $2.9 million or earnings of $0.14 per basic weighted average common share. For the three months ended December 31, 2022, we generated net interest income of $19.7 million and distributable earnings of $12.6 million or $0.62 per basic weighted average common share. On an annual basis, for the year ended December 31, 2022, we earned GAAP net income of $35.9 million or earnings of $1.80 per basic weighted average common share. In 2022, we generated net interest income of $74.7 million and distributable earnings of $49.9 million or $2.51 per basic weighted average common share.
